title: RPG Music Pack: Medieval Fantasy
description: Downloadable Music Pack for Medieval Fantasy RPG's
longDescription:
RPG MUSIC PACK: MEDIEVAL FANTASY

This video game music package contains 12 tracks(11 loopable) which composed with orchestral and medieval instruments. That themes are usable for main screen, cutscenes, town, tavern, forest, combat, epic boss fight and more. Also suitable for strategy, fps or similar game types which set in medieval era.


Spotify Preview / Youtube Preview


TRACKLIST (WAV, 44.1khz, 16bit, 15m46s)

  • Serve the Chaos [01:45]         
  • Bard's Hope (LOOP) [00:59]        
  • The Elven Realms (LOOP) [01:04]      
  • Astrolabe (LOOP) [01:55]         
  • No End in Sight (LOOP) [00:54]             
  • Little Troubles (LOOP) [00:45]      
  • Deep Silence (LOOP) [01:04]        
  • Sword Dance (LOOP) [01:15]        
  • Elegy for the Elder City (LOOP) [01:12] 
  • End This...Now! (LOOP) [02:00]      
  • Come, Join Us! (LOOP) [00:56]       
  • Land of Serenity (LOOP) [01:57]  


NOTES

  • When you purchase this package, you can use it as you wish in your video games; but you cannot claim, sell or remix. Songs are protected by copyrights. You can use the songs on social media, but you cannot monetize them.
  • The mastering level of these songs is integrated -23 LUFS, which is perfect for your games. Streaming versions are louder and not including in the pack.
  • I would be glad to know how you used the songs, so i can share your game with my audience. 


Composed and produced by Suat Can

If you have any questions or would like to have custom music for your project, you can reach me from here:

✉ suartcan@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
•  159 MB of high quality WAV files (44.100 Hz, 1411 Kbps)
  •  12 ready-to-use original music themes (11 loopable) for RPG's set in medieval era.
  •  15 min. 46 sec. of music for main screen, cutscenes, town, tavern, forest, combat, epic boss fight and more.
  • Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5
  • Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5
